text: ya log khuda ko chhod kar aisee cheez kee parasatish karate hai jo na unako nukasaan hee pahuncha sakatee hai na napha aur kahate hain ki khuda ke yahaan yahee log hamaare siphaarishee hoge (ai rasool) tum (inase) kaho to kya tum khuda ko aisee cheez kee khabar dete ho jisako vah na to aasamaanon mein (kaheen) paata hai aur na zameen mein ye log jis cheez ko usaka shareek banaate hai
